languages.text: 対象は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}失敗した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ランダムな{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を受ける。

traits.locale_text: 対象は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}失敗した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ランダムな{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает случайный общий {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает случайный общий {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text: Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang mit einem zufälligen gewöhnlichen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} belegt zu werden.
languages.original_text: The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer a random common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang mit einem zufälligen gewöhnlichen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} belegt zu werden.

languages.text: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde rastgele bir yaygın {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiye{/g} maruz kalır. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer a random common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde rastgele bir yaygın {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiye{/g} maruz kalır. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} commun aléatoire durant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer a random common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} commun aléatoire durant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o sufrir un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} común aleatorio durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer a random common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o sufrir un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} común aleatorio durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: 目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。如果未能通过检定，则会随机获得一项常规{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
